title: The Mayor of Casterbridge - complex relationship

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hardy uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex relationship between the two characters.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hardy uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex relationship between the two characters.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
